source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_000010_GILGAMESH<tab>To my side, Enkidu! The battle is joined!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_000010_GILGAMESH<tab>To my side, Enkidu! The battle is joined!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_000020_GILGAMESH<tab>Owww! It hurts! It hurts!Enkidu! Your master wants for succor!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_000020_GILGAMESH<tab>Owww! It hurts! It hurts!Enkidu! Your master wants for succor!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_000030_GILGAMESH<tab>Fancy some feathers...bird brain?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_000030_GILGAMESH<tab>Fancy some feathers...bird brain?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_000040_GILGAMESH<tab>This should cut you down to size...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_000040_GILGAMESH<tab>This should cut you down to size...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_000050_GILGAMESH<tab>Fight on, Enkidu, my ever faithful─hm!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_000050_GILGAMESH<tab>Fight on, Enkidu, my ever faithful─hm!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_000060_GILGAMESH<tab>Enkidu! Are the bonds of our friendship so fragile!?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_000060_GILGAMESH<tab>Enkidu! Are the bonds of our friendship so fragile!?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_000070_GILGAMESH<tab>Not the <var 1A 02 /var>strongest<var 1A 01 /var> of swords, but it should suffice.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_000070_GILGAMESH<tab>Not the <var 1A 02 /var>strongest<var 1A 01 /var> of swords, but it should suffice.

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_000080_GILGAMESH<tab>Gilgamesh is in the mood...for dancing!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_000080_GILGAMESH<tab>Gilgamesh is in the mood...for dancing!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_000090_GILGAMESH<tab>Divide and conquer, Gilgamesh style!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_000090_GILGAMESH<tab>Divide and conquer, Gilgamesh style!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_000100_GILGAMESH<tab>...And now for something truly <var 1A 02 /var>shocking<var 1A 01 /var>!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_000100_GILGAMESH<tab>...And now for something truly <var 1A 02 /var>shocking<var 1A 01 /var>!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_000110_GILGAMESH<tab>What's the matter, friend? All tied up?
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_000110_GILGAMESH<tab>What's the matter, friend? All tied up?

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_000120_GILGAMESH<tab>Uh-oh! Someone just woke the dragon...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_000120_GILGAMESH<tab>Uh-oh! Someone just woke the dragon...

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_000130_GILGAMESHYou have some skill, I'll give you that...
But Gilgamesh has only just begun to fight!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_000130_GILGAMESHYou have some skill, I'll give you that...
But Gilgamesh has only just begun to fight!

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_000140_GILGAMESHMost impressive!
Very well─I, too, shall fight with all my strength!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_000140_GILGAMESHMost impressive!
Very well─I, too, shall fight with all my strength!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_000150_GILGAMESH<tab>No! The mighty Gilgamesh will not be defeated!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_000150_GILGAMESH<tab>No! The mighty Gilgamesh will not be defeated!

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_100010_GILGAMESHAt long last, we meet again on the battlefield!
I daresay Enkidu shall come to enjoy our tussles as much as I.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_100010_GILGAMESHAt long last, we meet again on the battlefield!
I daresay Enkidu shall come to enjoy our tussles as much as I.

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_100020_GILGAMESHYou, however, might not find this one so enjoyable.
...Unless you enjoy getting pounded senseless. Hah!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_100020_GILGAMESHYou, however, might not find this one so enjoyable.
...Unless you enjoy getting pounded senseless. Hah!

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_200010_GILGAMESHMe? Run away? Hah! I-I was but seeking out a
more suitable spot to celebrate my inevitable victory!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_200010_GILGAMESHMe? Run away? Hah! I-I was but seeking out a
more suitable spot to celebrate my inevitable victory!

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_200020_GILGAMESHBut enough exposition! Now we fight like men!
And ladies! And ladies who dress like men!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_200020_GILGAMESHBut enough exposition! Now we fight like men!
And ladies! And ladies who dress like men!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_200030_GILGAMESH<tab>For Gilgamesh...it is transmogrifying time!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_200030_GILGAMESH<tab>For Gilgamesh...it is transmogrifying time!

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_200040_GILGAMESHThe mightiest warrior ever to grace Eorzea stands before you─
by which I mean I, Gilgamesh! Prepare yourself!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_200040_GILGAMESHThe mightiest warrior ever to grace Eorzea stands before you─
by which I mean I, Gilgamesh! Prepare yourself!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_300010_GILGAMESH<tab>To think that my full complement of arms would avail me naught...
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_300010_GILGAMESH<tab>To think that my full complement of arms would avail me naught...

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_300020_GILGAMESH<tab>No more high jinks from Gilgamesh. You have my word.
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_300020_GILGAMESH<tab>No more high jinks from Gilgamesh. You have my word.

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_300030_GILGAMESHThe Treaty-Blade, too, I shall return.
...Just as soon as I remember where I hid it.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_300030_GILGAMESHThe Treaty-Blade, too, I shall return.
...Just as soon as I remember where I hid it.

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_300040_GILGAMESHAnyway, I yield to your unparalleled puissance!
Spare my insignificant life, I beg of you!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_300040_GILGAMESHAnyway, I yield to your unparalleled puissance!
Spare my insignificant life, I beg of you!

source: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_400010_GILGAMESH<tab>...NOT! Ha, I lied...again! Like a rug! Oh, I kill me!
target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_400010_GILGAMESH<tab>...NOT! Ha, I lied...again! Like a rug! Oh, I kill me!

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_400020_GILGAMESHYou can take that fusty old blade for all I care! I thirst for true
power, and naught save the strongest of swords will suffice!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_400020_GILGAMESHYou can take that fusty old blade for all I care! I thirst for true
power, and naught save the strongest of swords will suffice!

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_400030_GILGAMESHWarrior of Light─you have proven a worthy opponent.
But I warn you─treasure every moment with your weapon.
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_400030_GILGAMESHWarrior of Light─you have proven a worthy opponent.
But I warn you─treasure every moment with your weapon.

source:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_400040_GILGAMESHFor as sure as day follows night, the hour will come when
I claim it as mine own! Till we meet again!
target:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_03000_400040_GILGAMESHFor as sure as day follows night, the hour will come when
I claim it as mine own! Till we meet again!
